@title LuckySeven
 @dev LuckySeven is a contract to generate random number with low cost

@title LuckySeven
 @dev LuckySeven is a contract to generate random number with low cost

devdoc.details: LuckySeven is a contract to generate random number with low cost

generator(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Generates a pseudo random number on chain with super low gas cost (850 gas)

params.i: 5. chooses the starting position to start cutting the number
params.j: 6. to choose the length of the random number (digits from i position to left)
params.mu: 3. value for the oscilator to introduce entropy
params.n: 2. power of the 10 on the divisor of the PRNG

devdoc.title: LuckySeven

generator(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Generates a pseudo random number on chain with super low gas cost (850 gas)
